question: You have seen an advertisement from a couple, who live in Australia, for someone to teach their two children your language for a year. Write a letter to the couple. In your letter-	Explain why you would be suitable for the job-	Say what else you could do for the family-	Give your reasons for wanting the job
text: I am writing you this letter to express my interest in an advertisement in Della Gazette.

Since I speak my native language very well, I won some awards in my country so  I thought I am suitable for this job. Also since I studied a lot of pedagogy classes during my university, I feel that these are preferred features.

Although I stay alone in my home, I developed my cooking ability so I can cook for you. I may help with the household chores if you need them. Besides cooking, I can wash dishes and clothes. When you have enough time, you can enjoy your life.
I need to make money because I study at a university where tuition is expensive. My parent funds me but I want more to buy new books for my education. Improving myself is my passion.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
